name: atomblast.io
description: First attempt at multiplayer online io game

scripts.test: (jest && echo "$(tput setaf 2)$(tput setab 0)Unit testing passed.$(tput sgr0)") || (echo "$(tput setaf 1)$(tput setab 7)Unit testing failed." && exit 1)
scripts.lint:
echo 'Working directory: ' && pwd && echo 'Please wait. Lint Checking...
' && ((npm run env-test && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint ./src/ && echo "$(tput setaf 2)$(tput setab 0)Linting Passed.$(tput sgr0)" ) || (echo "$(tput setaf 1)$(tput setab 7)linting check failed. Run 'npm run fix-lint' to attemp automatic fix$(tput sgr0)" && exit 1))
scripts.fix-lint:
(echo 'Please wait. Linting...
' && npm run env-test && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint ./src/ --fix) || (echo "$(tput setaf 1)$(tput setab 7)Auto Linting failed. Please manually fix the above errors.$(tput sgr0)" && exit 1)
scripts.env-test:
if [ -d './src/' ]; then echo 'src directory detected!'; else echo "$(tput setaf 1)$(tput setab 7)

CRITICAL: src directory NOT DETECTED
ABORTING!!!

$(tput sgr0)" && exit 1; fi
scripts.precommit: npm run env-test && npm run lint && echo "Running unit testing.." && npm test
scripts.prepush: npm run env-test && npm run lint && echo 'Prepush build skipped' && npm test

author: Bananium Labs
